If anyone knows more about how alien numbers are designed, about how the alien number system works, or know of anyone held in detention who was not assigned a number, please get in touch: ejfox@ejfox.com

It would also make it very difficult to reliably track and report migrant deaths. If they‚Äôre not in the system to begin with, there is no record of them dying or going missing. Reports of migrant deaths was a key part of Pelosi‚Äôs negotiations over the latest funding bill.

Without consistent tracking of the people being held in these facilities it would be incredibly easy to lose people in the system. We have already seen this with parents separated from their children unable to be reunited with parents because DHS could not provide them.
There is no legal mandate to do so. It would be very easy for CBP / ICE to say those migrants are only here temporarily and thus don‚Äôt warrant being assigned alien numbers.
I want to say this very clearly and loudly: until someone proves otherwise, I do not believe all migrants captured by ICE / CBP are being assigned alien numbers.
